name: piscatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the activity of catching fish: All along the coast we saw settlements of piscatory tribes. The island is home to numerous piscatory birds.
More examplesFewer examplesI was extremely proud of my piscatory success.The dining room of the inn contained an arrangement of lobster pots, nets, and other piscatory accessories.The local people had a mainly piscatory way of life, but they supplemented their diet of fish with rice and fruit.This book is a classic of piscatory literature, rooted in the culture of the Mediterranean coast.
